analyzed: anottappam natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti

original: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappaṁ pahīnaṁ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
analyzed: sadhamma kusalassa arahataḥ anottappam natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti
para dhamma kusalassa arahataḥ rāga ppahānāya maggaḥ bhāvito pe

original: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
analyzed: bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī ti

original: Sadhammakusalassa arahato anottappapahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
analyzed: sadhamma kusalassa arahataḥ anottappa pahānāya bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti
para dhamma kusalaḥ arahā vīta rāgaḥ vīta dosaḥ vīta moho pe

original: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
analyzed: sacchikātabbam sacchikata natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti
sa dhamma kusalaḥ arahā vīta rāgaḥ vīta dosaḥ vīta moho pe

original: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, natthi tassa asuci sukkavissaṭṭhīti?
analyzed: sacchikātabbam sacchikata natthi tassa asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti
atthi arahataḥ asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti

original: “ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puthujjanā sīlasampannā satā sampajānā niddaṁ okkamanti, tesaṁ asuci na muccati.
analyzed: ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū puthujjanā sīla sampannā satā sampajānā niddam okkamanti tesam asuci na muccati

original: Yepi te, bhikkhave, bāhirakā isayo kāmesu vītarāgā, tesampi asuci na muccati.
analyzed: ye pi te bhikkhave bāhirakāḥ isayo kāmesu vīta rāgā tesam pi asuci na muccati

original: Aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso yaṁ arahato asuci mucceyyā”ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam eta bhikkhave anavakāsaḥ yam arahataḥ asuci mucceyya ati
atthi arahataḥ asuci sukka vissaṭṭhī iti
nanu arahataḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram pare upasahareyyunti

original: Hañci arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ pare upasaṁhareyyuṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci arahataḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram pare upasahareyyu tena vata re vattabbe

original: Arahato cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ pare upasaṁhareyyunti, atthi arahato parūpahāroti?
analyzed: arahataḥ cīvara piṇḍapāta senāsana gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāram pare upasahareyyunti atthi arahataḥ para upahāraḥ ti

original: Arahato sotāpattiphalaṁ vā sakadāgāmiphalaṁ vā anāgāmiphalaṁ vā arahattaṁ vā pare upasaṁhareyyunti?
analyzed: arahataḥ sa utāpatti phalam vā sakadāgāmi phalam vā anāgāmi phalam vā arahattam vā pare upasahareyyunti
